feed.title: SAP Community - SAP Marketing Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP Marketing Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: How to create a segmentation profile where contacts have country or marketing area?
entry.content: I need to create a Segmentation Profile and filter only those contacts which either contains country information or Marketing Area information. How can I do it?

entry.title: Uploading Document in SAP Marketing Cloud forms
entry.content: Greetings, I would like to know if it is possible to enable Document Upload option in SAP Marketing Cloud forms. Is it possible to have a custom field as a box for documents upload? If so, can you please provide me with the steps to enable that? If not, what is the best approach using SAP Document Service? My current approach is a bit complex as I have to send SAP DMS folder link separately to each contact registered in SAP Marketing Cloud.

entry.title: Restrict Business Users from Deleting Contacts because of multiple Marketing Area
entry.content:
We have the following Problem: User can delete contacts in the contacts app which share more than one Marketing Area!

Background: 
Contacts are assigned to multiple Marketing Areas with several Subscriptions. Different User Roles have access to different Marketing Areas eg:

  • Business Unit A - Marketing Area A
  • Business Unit B - Marketing Area B 
  • etc.

If a User from Business Unit A now deletes a contact which also has Marketing Area B, C and D, the contact with all its subscriptions / interactions is being deleted for all Marketing Areas.  

My goal is that all business roles have access to Write, Read Access to "Import, Change Values for Custom fields, Create Target Groups etc" but I do not want that users are able to delete contacts, as this has an impact on other business units as well, as contacts have multiple subscriptions etc.

- We have tried to restrict the Write, Read access which then causes issues that Users can purely see but not import / update contacts anymore via contacts app anymore

- I have also tried to check a different layout, but I cant remove the "Delete Button" from the Layout. 

 

Does someone has a clue or idea on I can restrict users from being able to delete contacts via the contacts app but still be able to import change data or create contacts? Any help is highly appreciated. 

BR
Sascha

entry.title: Forms KPIs report
entry.content:
Upon clicking on the Analytics tab in a Form.

You will see KPIs, Views, Submission, Submission/Views. New Contacts, and New Contacts/Submissions

We want to have same report as Form Analytics KPIs.
However we can not find the fields that are shown in Analytics in standard CDS views or standard analytics reports.
Could you tell us which CDS views are used to generate the KPIs in Form ?
What we're looking for is following.
1. Is "Views" KPI coming from the interaction that have Interaction type=Click_through? If so the interactions are generated campaign level, not Form.
   How/from which CDS Form Analytics get the value?
2. Is "Submitted" the interaction that have Interaction type = WEBSITE_REGISTRATION ? How/from which CDS Form Analytics get the value?
3. How "New Contact" identify new contact? What is the definition of "New"?

entry.title: HTML modification in email editor
entry.content: Is it possible to personalize an email message by editing the HTML code in an email editor (not legacy editor)? I view it as read only.

entry.title: Reset OriginDataLastChgUTCDateTime (accidentally set to future date)
entry.content:
Hi,

I was doing some tests with the API_MKT_CONTACT_SRV and I accidentally set the OriginDataLastChgUTCDateTime value of a contact to a future date.

Now the system is not accepting any more updates as it says "Imported entry xxx outdated (existing data valid from [future date]".

Is there some way by which I can reset or set back this date?

Because whatever update I try to to set it back to today, it keeps saying it does not want to perform the update.

entry.title: OData API Service Performance Campaign
entry.content:
Hi SAP,

I need to export Campaign Performance to Tableau. Do you know if there is any OData service to do that?

Thanks.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: How to crearte a segmentation in SAP Marketing Cloud to filter only users with Interaction as OptOut
entry.content: I want to create segmentation for users who have opted out from email communications in SAP Marketing Cloud. I used filter as Interaction Type = MKT_OPT_OUT but it includes Opt In users as well.

entry.title: Is link alias not available for interaction segmentation?
entry.content:
Hi,

In contact-based segmentation, there is an attribute "Text of Launch URL" that gives the description/alias of a clicked link in an email.

In interaction-based segmentation, I only seem to find "Launch URL", which is the whole url with https and GA tags and different per language...

Am I just not looking correctly, or is there no field available in interaction-segmentation that is the equivalent of "Text of Launch URL" in contact-segmentation? 

Thanks if someone can confirm this.

entry.title: Need help in creating correct field values in segmentation if data is coming from multiple origins
entry.content:
Hi Team,

We have records coming from multiple sources. Source A and Source B. We have few records like abc@marketing.com coming from both sources A & B. Based on Match and Merge logic, record is merged. We have field called "Event" and value for that field comes from both the sources. 

Now, In segmentation when we select ID Origin as B then also it shows Event Value from Source A. We would like to see Event value coming from only Source B. 

How can we address this issue?

Thanks,

Shoaib Patel

entry.title: What happens to links when SAP Hybris marketing is migrated to other system?
entry.content:
Hi All,

We are currently migrating Hybris Marketing on-premise system to other Marketing tool. I just want to clarify that what happens when a recipient unsubscribes from an old email is sent from hybris.

Does anyone have any suggestion for this that how do we manage permission from old email once we are fully migrated to other marketing tool?

Thanks,

Shivani

entry.title: Prefilled Forms but different Matching ID
entry.content:
Hello,
 
We are acting in the B2B segment when it comes to sales and marketing processes. Videos/articles and white papers are made available via forms on our homepage.
 
To promote this gated content, we send emails to targeted contacts. The forms are pre-filled for more convenience and to provide a better customer journey. For this we use the “Outbound ID” function which is enabled on the url itself. 
 
Our current problem is that some customers/contacts forward the URL or email and other people (with other personal details) fill out the form. Due to the outbound ID, these two contacts will now be merged. Usually the orignal contacts gets a new name and email for their best record. 
 
I would now like to know how and whether there are other solutions, for example that the SMC on forms can be checked with the email, regarding match and merge logic. 
 
Does anyone here have ideas or feedback? How have you solved this problem? 
 
BR 
Sascha

entry.title: How can we integrate SAP C4C Sales Order with SAP Marketing cloud?
entry.content: We have a requirement to bring Sales Order data from C4C into SMC. Can you guys please suggest me best possible approach for the same?

entry.title: Increase of Hard Bounce Threshold in SMC
entry.content:
Hi there, 

it sometimes happens that emails are not being delivered and ISPs/mail servers return "hard bounces" even though the mail box exists and it might be due to a temporary "block". 

While most other marketing solutions support to set a threshold of up to three (3) consecutive hard bounces, until a final block is happening for a better list hygiene / sender reputation. 

Is there anything like this for the SAP Marketing Cloud? I feel like, also recovering the accidently bounces via "Inbound" Interaction is a very ineeficient and cumbersome task.

  • Can you maybe share best practices how you handle such problems?
  • Can the threshold be increased by default or via our ESP Sinch?

BR

Sascha

entry.title: Has anyone tried integrating SAP C4C Survey with SAP Marketing Cloud?
entry.content: I was wondering if anyone has tried C4C Survey Integration with SAP Marketing Cloud?

entry.title: How do I select which ID origin personalizes a content studio email link
entry.content:
Hi SAP Experts,

We have multiple ID Origins (i.e., email, BuPa ID, hashed email, etc.). Within Content Studio, I need to personalize a specific URL. The use case is to appended & personalize the URL with the BuPa ID for the respective email recipient.

Example: my list contains two recipients; myself and a colleague. My BuPa ID is 1234 while my colleague's BuPa ID is 6789. The email I receive should have my BuPa ID at the end of the URL while the email my colleague receives should have their BuPa ID at the end of the URL (i.e.., my email would have this URL: ....example.com?id=1234 while my colleague would have this URL: ....example.com?id=6789).

In Content Studio, I built the email and followed this path to select the ID personalization: under Link Properties -> Personalized URL, selected "ID" (under the consumer level). I sent a test using "send using contact." The test send included all IDs (i.e., BuPa ID, email address, hashed, etc.) in the URL.

How do I place a rule in the Link Personalization to only pull through the BuPa ID origin?

Furthermore, if a recipient has 2 or more BuPa IDs, how do I limit the number of BuPa IDs passed through the URL?

In your response, will you please include screen shots as a way to confirm we're viewing the same platform settings/location/version?

If it helps, here is some information on which system I'm using:
Product Name: SAP Marketing Cloud 2502
Application ID: LAUNCHPAD
Application Version: 28.0.150

Thanks,
Daniella

entry.title: Error note in campaign execution for generating export file
entry.content:
Hi everyone,

we ran a campaign in which an export file should have been generated. The campaign is running on error with this note CUAN_MKT_EXEC_FRW059 

Does anyone know what it means?

Best regards,

Valeska

entry.title: SAP Marketing Cloud - Set Email in Best Record strictly by Prio of Origin (ignoring Permissions)
entry.content:
Dear colleagues,

the standard behavior is described here: 2850695 - SAP Marketing - Contact Best Record Email Address not taken from most reliable Source - SAP for Me

Nevertheless, the Email from Sales Cloud (which is top prio) should always be taken over to the Best record. So the plan was to use Custom Logic via Update Interaction Contact (best record).

See here the slightly modified sample code downloaded from MC:

DATA:
lr_ic_root_new TYPE REF TO cuan_s_ce_ic_rt_badi,
lv_contact_number TYPE cuan_s_ce_ic_rt_badi-record_idx,
lv_index LIKE sy-tabix,
lr_facet_data TYPE REF TO cuan_s_ce_ic_badi,
lt_facet_data TYPE cuan_t_ce_ic_badi,
ls_interaction TYPE cuan_s_ce_ia_badi ##NEEDED,
lr_add_facet TYPE REF TO cuan_s_ce_ic_facet_add_badi,
lt_add_facet TYPE cuan_t_ce_ic_facet_add_badi,
lr_attr_rstrctn TYPE REF TO cuan_s_ce_ic_atrst_badi,
lt_attr_rstrctn TYPE cuan_t_ce_ic_atrst_badi,
lr_mkta TYPE REF TO cuan_s_ce_ic_mkta_badi,
lt_mkta TYPE cuan_t_ce_ic_mkta_badi,
lt_old_ic_root TYPE cuan_t_ce_ic_rt_badi,
lr_old_ic_root TYPE REF TO cuan_s_ce_ic_rt_badi.

* Process all updated interaction contacts.
LOOP AT new_contact_root REFERENCE INTO lr_ic_root_new.

lv_contact_number = lr_ic_root_new->record_idx.
CLEAR: lt_facet_data,
lt_add_facet,
lt_attr_rstrctn,
lt_mkta,
lt_old_ic_root.

* Get common data of main facets of current contact into LT_FACET_DATA.
READ TABLE contact_data WITH KEY record_idx = lv_contact_number TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS BINARY SEARCH.
IF sy-subrc EQ 0.
lv_index = sy-tabix.
DO.
READ TABLE contact_data REFERENCE INTO lr_facet_data INDEX lv_index.
IF sy-subrc EQ 0 AND lr_facet_data->record_idx EQ lv_contact_number.
APPEND lr_facet_data->* TO lt_facet_data.
lv_index = lv_index + 1.
ELSE.
EXIT.
ENDIF.
ENDDO.
SORT lt_facet_data BY id_origin id ASCENDING timestamp DESCENDING .
ENDIF.

* Get imported interaction of current contact into LS_INTERACTION.
READ TABLE interaction WITH KEY record_idx = lv_contact_number INTO ls_interaction BINARY SEARCH.
IF sy-subrc NE 0.
CLEAR ls_interaction.
ENDIF.

* Get additional facets of current contact into LT_ADD_FACET.
READ TABLE additional_facet WITH KEY record_idx = lv_contact_number TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS BINARY SEARCH.
IF sy-subrc EQ 0.
lv_index = sy-tabix.
DO.
READ TABLE additional_facet REFERENCE INTO lr_add_facet INDEX lv_index.
IF sy-subrc EQ 0 AND lr_add_facet->record_idx EQ lv_contact_number.
APPEND lr_add_facet->* TO lt_add_facet.
lv_index = lv_index + 1.
ELSE.
EXIT.
ENDIF.
ENDDO.
SORT lt_add_facet ASCENDING BY id_origin id.
ENDIF.

* Get IC best record attributes' restrictions of current contact into LT_ATTR_RSTRCTN.
READ TABLE attribute_rstrctn WITH KEY record_idx = lv_contact_number TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS BINARY SEARCH.
IF sy-subrc EQ 0.
lv_index = sy-tabix.
DO.
READ TABLE attribute_rstrctn REFERENCE INTO lr_attr_rstrctn INDEX lv_index.
IF sy-subrc EQ 0 AND lr_attr_rstrctn->record_idx EQ lv_contact_number.
APPEND lr_attr_rstrctn->* TO lt_attr_rstrctn.
lv_index = lv_index + 1.
ELSE.
EXIT.
ENDIF.
ENDDO.
SORT lt_attr_rstrctn ASCENDING BY attribute value.
ENDIF.

* Get marketing areas of current contact.
READ TABLE marketing_area WITH KEY record_idx = lv_contact_number TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS BINARY SEARCH.
IF sy-subrc EQ 0.
lv_index = sy-tabix.
DO.
READ TABLE marketing_area REFERENCE INTO lr_mkta INDEX lv_index.
IF sy-subrc EQ 0 AND lr_mkta->record_idx EQ lv_contact_number.
APPEND lr_mkta->* TO lt_mkta.
lv_index = lv_index + 1.
ELSE.
EXIT.
ENDIF.
ENDDO.
SORT lt_mkta ASCENDING BY mkt_area_id.
ENDIF.

* Get old best record(s) of current contact into LT_OLD_IC_ROOT.
READ TABLE old_contact_root WITH KEY record_idx = lv_contact_number TRANSPORTING NO FIELDS BINARY SEARCH.
IF sy-subrc EQ 0.
lv_index = sy-tabix.
DO.
READ TABLE old_contact_root REFERENCE INTO lr_old_ic_root INDEX lv_index.
IF sy-subrc EQ 0 AND lr_old_ic_root->record_idx EQ lv_contact_number.
APPEND lr_old_ic_root->* TO lt_old_ic_root.
lv_index = lv_index + 1.
ELSE.
EXIT.
ENDIF.
ENDDO.
SORT lt_old_ic_root DESCENDING BY validation_status.
ENDIF.

 

* Example: Store in best record preferably the email address of the CRM business partner data.

CLEAR lr_ic_root_new->smtp_addr. " clear the email address of the best record (= IC root record)
READ TABLE lt_add_facet REFERENCE INTO lr_add_facet
WITH KEY id_origin = 'EMAIL'
id_origin_group = 'SAP_C4C_BUPA'.
IF sy-subrc EQ 0.
lr_ic_root_new->smtp_addr = lr_add_facet->id.
ENDIF.

* Example: If there is no email address from CRM business partner data,
* take any other email address with positive opt-in (=marketing permission).

IF lr_ic_root_new->smtp_addr IS INITIAL.
READ TABLE lt_attr_rstrctn REFERENCE INTO lr_attr_rstrctn
WITH KEY attribute = 'SMTP_ADDR'
value_mp_opt_in = 'Y'
value_invalid = abap_false.
IF sy-subrc EQ 0.
lr_ic_root_new->smtp_addr = lr_attr_rstrctn->value.
ENDIF.
ENDIF.

ENDLOOP.

 
 
The bold part is modifed but the result of using that custom logic is always that the Email is deleted. So my assumption is that the id_origin_group is not the correct one. We use the "new" standard integration between Sales Cloud v1 and Marketing Cloud via SOAP. So the data is stored with additional origin / id SAP_C4C_BUPA but basically saved unter SAP_MKT_BUPA. Nevertheless this also doesn't work in the code and it's kind of difficult to find the correct values. Inspect Contact is also not displaying the Email from Sales Cloud at all even if it is visible one the Contact's Communication section and the Permission (with updates). 
 
Thank help how to correct the custom logic above or, even better, formulate the logic to take the Email strictly by Prio of Origin without naming explicit orgins in the code. Is this possible with using SOAP integration from Sales Cloud with the resulting data setup.
 
Thank you & best regards,
Aaron

entry.title: SAP Marketing Cloud Campaign Approval Workflow - Add Custom Conditions
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community!

I was working on Approval Workflows for Campaigns in SAP Marketing Cloud. I know it is possible to add more conditions to the workflow according to these pages:

  • Custom Conditions for Campaign Approval Workflow | SAP Help Portal
  • Approval workflow in SAP Marketing Cloud (Part 4) ... - SAP Community

I was wondering if "Program" is part of those fields I can add to the custom conditions to the campaign approval workflow.

And if there is also a syntax guideline to code in the custom logic app for these. I've seen the example, but do all fields added as conditions follow the same patterns? is there a guide to code there? (I'm not a coder, but sometimes I get to learn enough to build something simple... is adding Program something simple?)

Kind Regards

Rebeca

entry.title: A question on SAP Marketing Cloud Coupons (and Offers)
entry.content:
Hello marketers experts!

We are starting to work with Offers and Coupons in SAP Marketing Cloud at my organization.

Since our coupons are generated by an external system, we mass upload them into Marketing Cloud through the "Manage Coupons" app. The coupon type and relationship type combination that best suits us is "Multiple Coupon Codes and Contact Assigned Dynamically"

Later, we create an Offer and we assign a target group to that Offer (because of the eligibility criteria).  That Static Target Group is the same that receives the campaign at the end. And we include the coupon cod on the email content we send in that campaign. We follow this process (Solved: Sending coupon via email in SAP Marketing Cloud - SAP Community)

After sending the email campaign with the offer code, I am requested to send the contact ID and the coupon cod that contact received through our email campaign, before the contact redeems it. Immediately after the campaign was sent or the coupon was assigned.

I tried visualizing that data through the Browse Interaction Data but it was not possible to see them from the standard view (I tried to add "coupon cod e" and wasn't there). I did see the coupon cod e assigned to a particular contact though, there at Browse Contact Interaction Data, I went inside each outbound email interaction and see the Offer and Coupon Section and there it was the coupon cod e assigned to the contact. Still, to do that for a lot of contacts is not efficient.

From the Analytics and Report Gallery Offer reports the coupons are not visible, I could just see offers. (We don't have SAC either)

I understand that SAP Marketing Cloud assigns the coupon codes randomly to the contacts present in the target group. And I want to mass extract that assignation of contact ID (or email ID, or interaction ID) and coupon cod assigned. Is that possible?
